ModMetaData.name: Pawn Badge - Collection
ModMetaData.author: Texas Redhawk
ModMetaData.description:
Update and combination of Badge-mods Combined all badges-mods into one mod where you can select active sets from mod-options. If you have an idea for a badge-set, just leave a comment
Badge-mods included:
Star-Wars themed: Imperial Army Imperial Navy Rebels
Texas Redhawks three mods: Command and Conquer Brotherhood of Nod - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1752397431 Command and Conquer Global Defense Initiative - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1752390601 WWII German Army - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1756882185
- Added more transparent versions of GDI and Nod-badges, thanks to user fallout me
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/PawnBadgeCC
